meanings.definition: To equip or control with transistors.
meanings.sent1: Dad transistorizes his old radio to make it work better.
meanings.sent2: The technician transistorizes the electronic device for improved performance.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to transistorize itself, thinking it would become smarter.
meanings.sent4: She transistorizes her car with new technology, turning it into a high-tech vehicle.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's invention transistorizes the entire industry, revolutionizing how things are done.

meanings.definition: To convert into a transistorized circuit.
meanings.sent1: The engineer transistorizes the traditional circuit to make it more efficient.
meanings.sent2: They transistorize the old system, upgrading it with modern technology.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand seems to transistorize objects into something magical.
meanings.sent4: The idea of love can transistorize even the coldest heart, bringing warmth and light.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush transistorizes the canvas, creating a masterpiece of colors and shapes.
